translation.en: [Peter] Make sure to block him. Make sure he doesn't get over there.
translation.es: Tienes que atajarlo. Atájalo, que no llegue hasta allá.

translation.en: [Peter] I got you. -Nice form. Feel good about that.
translation.es: - Te tengo. - Buena forma. Siéntete bien por eso.

translation.en: Ah, there you are, Leo, my boy.
I told you not to bother me when I'm with my friends.
translation.es: Te dije que no me molestes cuando esté con mis amigos.

translation.en: But I need you to open the books for me.
translation.es: Pero necesito que abras los libros por mí.

translation.en: It takes so much effort to knock even one off the shelf
translation.es: Se requiere tanto esfuerzo para bajar uno de la repisa,

translation.en: that I haven't the strength to turn pages.
translation.es: que no me queda fuerza para cambiar de página.

translation.en: Yes! Point! Point!
Okay, remember, we're calling it a goal.
translation.es: Bien, no lo olvides, esto se llama gol.

translation.en: Also, we agreed not to use our hands.
translation.es: Además, quedamos en no usar las manos.

translation.en: That is the point of leg ball. You use your legs.
translation.es: Ese es el chiste del piernabalón, que se usan las piernas.

translation.en: That's dumb. You used your head.
translation.es: Qué tontería. Tú usaste la cabeza.

translation.en: Yeah, but that's legal.
Shouldn't it be called leg and head ball?
Well, my abuela sewed the ball, so, I get to make the rules.
translation.es: Bueno, mi abuela cosió el balón, así que yo pondré las reglas.

translation.en: Ah, youth.
In my day, you settled disputes with a duel.
translation.es: En mis tiempos, arreglaban los conflictos con un duelo.

translation.en: I did not have an overabundance of chums by the end.
translation.es: La verdad no me quedaron muchos amigos al final.

translation.en: Could you please get lost?
Alas, I cannot.
You're unique, Leo.
The only boy I've ever met with the power to so effortlessly communicate the dead.
translation.es: El único chico que he conocido, con el poder de comunicarse sin esfuerzo con los muertos.

translation.en: A dark force rises and I must consult my books.
translation.es: Una fuerza oscura se avecina y necesito consultar mis libros.

translation.en: Ah, you can turn your own pages, Don Andres. Or just look at the cover.
translation.es: Puedes cambiar las páginas solo, don Andrés, o nada más ve la portada.

translation.en: That's what I do.
Anyway, I told you, I do not solve ghost problems anymore.
translation.es: Como sea, te dije que ya no resuelvo problemas de fantasmas.

translation.en: Leo, are you having one of your special times again?
translation.es: Leo, ¿estás teniendo uno de tus momentos especiales otra vez?

translation.en: No! And just a minute.
Go away, Don Andres.
Okay. Let's get back to the inaugural match of head and leg ball.
translation.es: Bien. Por qué no volvemos al partido inicial de balón-pie-cabeza.

translation.en: How about "football"?
Beautiful.
I mean, uh, beautiful idea, heh, Marcella.
Yes... that is a much better name for the game no one will play.
translation.es: Sí, ese nombre es mucho mejor para un juego que nadie va a jugar.

translation.en: You're being stubborn. Expect to be haunted tonight.
translation.es: Hoy estás terco. Te voy a espantar en la noche.

translation.en: You wanna play with us?
Um, I don't think she should.
-Why? -The weird lightning at your place
translation.es: - ¿Por qué? - Porque hay destellos raros en tu casa

translation.en: since you and your mom moved in. She's a hechicera.
translation.es: desde que te mudaste con tu mamá. Es una hechicera.

translation.en: Marcella's mom is not a sorceress.
translation.es: La mamá de Marcella no es una hechicera.

translation.en: Sorry, Leo. You're weird, but we're used to it.
translation.es: Lo siento, Leo. Aunque tú eres raro, ya estamos acostumbrados.

translation.en: Being around an hechicera-in-training? No, thank you.
translation.es: Pero ¿juntarnos con una aprendiz de hechicera? No, gracias.

translation.en: Ah, give them time. You've only been here, what, six months?
translation.es: Dales tiempo. Dime, ¿cuánto llevas aquí? ¿Seis meses?

translation.en: It's fine. The truth is my mother is weird.
translation.es: No importa. La verdad es que mi mamá sí es rara.

translation.en: My whole family is. I'm proud of who I am.
translation.es: Y toda mi familia. Me enorgullece lo que soy.

translation.en: Yeah.
That's... nice.
Here. For asking me to play. It was sweet of you.
translation.es: Ten. Por invitarme a jugar. Fue muy lindo.

translation.en: Yeah, it was.
I mean, you don't, uh--
Don't mention it. Heh.
So, shamanism is a pagan belief
translation.es: El chamanismo es la creencia pagana

translation.en: about perceiving and interacting with the spirit world.
translation.es: de percibir e interactuar con el mundo espiritual.

translation.en: Often, they believe in one special individual with access,
translation.es: Acostumbran creer en un individuo especial con acceso,

translation.en: whose job it was to speak for the dead.
translation.es: cuya labor es hablar por los muertos.

translation.en: And the dead have much to say.
translation.es: Y los muertos tienen mucho que decir.

translation.en: Why not tell them what dead people are like?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no les dices cómo son en realidad los muertos?

translation.en: Friar Tuck might give you extra credit.
translation.es: Tal vez el fray Barrigón te dé puntos extra.

translation.en: -What do you want, Teodora? -For you to get your head in the game.
translation.es: - ¿Ahora qué quieres, Teodora? - Quiero que te pongas las pilas.

translation.en: I heard what you said to Don Andres. Not cool.
translation.es: Ya supe lo que le dijiste a don Andrés. Cero lindo.

translation.en: I just wanna be my own person.
translation.es: Lo único que quiero es que me dejen tranquilo.

translation.en: Why is that so much to ask?
Um, maybe because it's not about you. There are more important things going on.
translation.es: Tal vez es porque no se trata de ti. Hay cosas más importantes.

translation.en: Don Andres isn't blowing smoke with this rising-evil thing.
translation.es: Don Andrés no está jugando con lo del resurgimiento del mal.

translation.en: I don't care.
Just go away!
[Godofredo] Leo, do you mind?
[Peter] Cuckoo.
Um... All right, there's a good explanation for this.
translation.es: Bien, hay una buena explicación para esto.

translation.en: You're nuts in the head.
[bell ringing] [kid] Let's go.
Perhaps next week we'll stay awake the whole lesson.
translation.es: Tal vez la próxima semana te quedes despierto toda la lección.

translation.en: I thought you of all people would like this class.
translation.es: Creí que a ti te gustaría esta clase más que a nadie.

translation.en: Sorry, Friar Godofredo.
I just...
Think nothing of it.
Don Andres?
Is that you?
Teo?
Hello.
Alebrije. Don't scare me like that.
Oh. Sorry, Leo.
Let me guess. You're here to tell me about rising evil.
translation.es: No me digas. Vienes a hablarme del mal que está surgiendo.

translation.en: No. I just wanted to play checkers with my pal.
translation.es: No. Solamente quería jugar damas con mi amigo.

translation.en: But now that you mention it, Don Andres and Teo told me what you said.
translation.es: Pero ahora que lo mencionas, don Andrés y Teo me contaron lo que dijiste.

translation.en: We're your friends, Leo.
Says who?
You people all just showed up at my door one day.
translation.es: De pronto se aparecieron de la nada un día.

translation.en: Oh, Leo.
You can't choose to be normal.
The world always sees us as we are, eventually.
translation.es: Con el tiempo, el mundo siempre nos ve como somos.

translation.en: Is that crazy goat bothering you again?
translation.es: ¿Esa cabra loca te está molestando otra vez?

translation.en: Ah! I am a beautiful alebrije, woman.
At least see me as something noble, like a horse, or a dragonfly-- Ow!
translation.es: Al menos véame como algo noble, como un caballo o una libélula...

translation.en: My magical butt!
Such an odd goat.
Perhaps he has the palsy.
Come in and I'll fix you some cocoa.
translation.es: Entra, te voy a hacer un chocolate caliente.

translation.en: Could you make it a double?
Guy who needs the Heimlich maneuver. No?
Oh! Two guys that need the Heimlich maneuver.
translation.es: Entonces dos tipos que se están atragantando.

translation.en: Demon churning butter.
By the headless ghost of King Charles, Leo!
translation.es: ¡Por el fantasma sin cabeza del rey Charles, Leo!

translation.en: -I almost had a heart attack. -Good thing you're already dead.
translation.es: - Casi haces que me dé un infarto. - Suerte que ya estás muerto.

translation.en: You have got to be kidding me. Really? This is how you guys spend your time?
translation.es: Esto tiene que ser una broma. ¿En serio? ¿Así es como pasan el tiempo?

translation.en: It's not like we have a lot of options.
translation.es: No es que tengamos muchas opciones.

translation.en: Waiting around for you to help us figure out these dark omens and stuff.
translation.es: Esperamos a que te dignes a resolver los presagios oscuros y eso.

translation.en: People were finally willing to be seen with me,
translation.es: La gente por fin aceptaba juntarse conmigo,

translation.en: but you stopped that.
You ruined the inaugural game of leg ball--
translation.es: Arruinaron el juego inicial de piernabalón...

translation.en: The other name was better.
What was it? "Knee ball"?
I can't take it! I know you've been there for me in the past,
translation.es: ¡Ya no lo soporto! Oigan, ya sé que me apoyaron antes,

translation.en: but people think I'm crazy because of you.
translation.es: pero todos creen que estoy loco por su culpa.

translation.en: Sometimes I think they're right.
translation.es: Y a veces, creo que tienen razón.

translation.en: -I wanna live a normal life! -Are we breaking up?
translation.es: - ¡Quiero tener una vida normal! - ¿Vas a romper con nosotros?

translation.en: Don't give us the old "it's not you, it's me."
translation.es: No nos salgas con la vieja excusa de no son ustedes, soy yo.

translation.en: No, it's definitely you. I'm done with this ghost stuff.
translation.es: No, claro que son ustedes. Ya me harté de los fantasmas.

translation.en: I don't know how many ways I can say it.
translation.es: No sé en qué idioma debo decirlo.

translation.en: What?
The portents, boy.
They augur the end times.
translation.es: Anuncian el fin de los tiempos.

translation.en: Great, 'cause it's time for this to end.
translation.es: Qué bueno, porque es tiempo de que esto termine.

translation.en: Alebrije?
If that's you, you're in big trouble.
translation.es: Si eres tú, estás en graves problemas.

translation.en: Abuela?
Abuela, get up! Are you all right?
I'm fine, Leo.
Tell the others.
-Join us. -Aah!
Hold on, Abuela!
Stay there and I'll get the doctor.
translation.es: Quédate ahí, yo iré por el doctor.

translation.en: [Abuela] Join us.
I see you.
Help! Help!
What is happening?
[possessed people] Join us.
-Join us. -Join us.
translation.es: - Únete a nosotros. - Únete a nosotros.

translation.en: Don't do that.
Marcella?
Are you okay?
He is coming.
Don't worry. We're here, my boy.
So, this is the new girl, huh?
translation.es: Así que esta es la niña nueva, ¿no?

translation.en: She's a little clingy.
I don't like these things!
Get to the monastery, Leo. It's the most fortified building in town.
translation.es: Ve al monasterio, Leo. Es el edificio más protegido del pueblo.

translation.en: There's too many.
Once again, it's up to us to save helpless you.
translation.es: Otra vez depende de nosotros salvar al niño indefenso.

translation.en: Just walking down the street here.
Ooh. Ah. Wish someone would possess me.
Ew. That was super gross.
Ooh. You dropped your hat, good sir.
translation.es: Se le cayó el sombrero, señor.

translation.en: Your hat may be trampled by zombies, sir.
translation.es: Los zombis le van a pisar el sombrero, señor.

translation.en: A better fate than the hideous thing deserves.
translation.es: Mejor destino del que merece esa cosa horrible.

translation.en: This is too slow! Let's go, go, go!
Leo, hop on!
Look out!
Not that way! Turn!
-No, no, no. -Yes, yes, yes!
Guys, get out of here.
You can't do anything for me.
The lad has a valid point.
His end will be too gory for my refined sensibilities.
translation.es: Su muerte será muy sangrienta para mi refinada sensibilidad.

translation.en: You're not going anywhere, Don Chicken.
translation.es: No irás a ningún lado, don Gallina.

translation.en: Okay, come and get it.
Back, I say! Back!
The power of my fist compels you!
translation.es: ¡El poder de mis puños se los ordena!

translation.en: Leo, this way!
I see an odd pigeon with you.
But what is it, really?
An alebrije. We call him Alebrije because his real name is too hard to pronounce.
translation.es: Es un alebrije. Lo llamamos Alebrije porque su nombre es muy difícil de pronunciar.

translation.en: Not hard at all, if you'd bite off the tip of your tongue like I said.
translation.es: No es tan difícil si te muerdes la punta de la lengua, como dije.

translation.en: Ah, well, that makes sense.
And are the ghosts with you?
Sure, they're right-- Wait, what? You know? You can see them?
translation.es: Claro, están... Un momento, ¿qué? ¿Lo sabe? ¿Puede verlos?

translation.en: No. But if you'd listened to my lecture,
translation.es: No. Pero si hubieras oído mi lección,

translation.en: you'd know there's always one person in a village that can speak with ghosts.
translation.es: sabrías que siempre hay una persona en cada pueblo, que puede hablar con fantasmas.

translation.en: It wasn't hard to figure out that person was you.
translation.es: No fue difícil deducir que esa persona eras tú.

translation.en: Don Andres, Teodora, meet Friar Godofredo.
translation.es: Don Andrés, Teodora, saluden a fray Godofredo.

translation.en: Pleased to meet you all.
Friar Godofredo, how do you know--?
translation.es: Fray Godofredo, ¿cómo es que sabe de...?

translation.en: I will tell you later. But now we must go. We have precious little time.
translation.es: Después te lo explico. Pero ahora hay que irnos. Nos queda muy poco tiempo.

translation.en: For weeks there have been mysterious signs that something otherworldly
translation.es: Durante semanas hubo señales misteriosas de que algo de otro mundo estaba sucediendo.

translation.en: -has been going on. [Teodora] Mm-hm.
translation.es: de que algo de otro mundo estaba sucediendo.

translation.en: -Told you. -Shh.
translation.es: Te dijimos. ¿Has visto alguna otra cosa extraña, Leo?

translation.en: Have you seen anything else that's odd, Leo?
translation.es: ¿Has visto alguna otra cosa extraña, Leo?

translation.en: Perhaps... one of these?
That one! It made my abuela's eyes white like milk.
translation.es: ¡Esa cosa! Le puso los ojos a mi abuela blancos, como leche.

translation.en: -There's a bunch of them out there. -Oh, no.
translation.es: - Hay un montón ahí afuera. - No.

translation.en: Those are the horroroso, the heralds of something far, far worse.
translation.es: Esos son los horrorosos. Los heraldos de algo mucho peor.

translation.en: The horroroso can use the life force of the living
translation.es: Los horrorosos usan la vitalidad de los vivos

translation.en: to breach their master's dimensional prison.
translation.es: para abrir la prisión dimensional de su amo.

translation.en: If Quetzalcoatl escapes,
an age of darkness will envelope the world.
translation.es: una era de oscuridad cubrirá al mundo.

translation.en: I'm no expert, but Quetzalcoatl isn't a monster, right?
translation.es: No soy experto, pero Quetzalcóatl no es un monstruo, ¿verdad?

translation.en: He's a creator god, a good guy.
translation.es: Es un dios creador, un buen tipo.

translation.en: When he's in a good mood.
And now, he is no longer in a good mood.
translation.es: Y ahora, ya no está de buen humor.

translation.en: He wants to wipe the slate that is the world clean,
translation.es: Quiere empezar de cero, barrer con todo el mundo

translation.en: and begin again.
That's gonna take a big eraser.
translation.es: Va a necesitar una gran escoba.

translation.en: Wait. Do you hear that?
The banging... it stopped.
Where did they all go?
Those two are being taken to the market by one of those... ugly things.
translation.es: A esos los está llevando al mercado esa cosa... horrible.

translation.en: The others are, too.
translation.es: Creo que a los demás también.

translation.en: By the pricking of my thumbs, something wicked this way comes.
translation.es: Por mis juanetes al pisar, algo maligno va a pasar.

translation.en: Just like in the book.
Friar Godofredo, what does it mean?
It means, Leo...
the end of the world...
has begun.
If my teeth were more than ectoplasmic mist,
translation.es: Si mis dientes no fueran de un vapor ectoplásmico,

translation.en: you would hear them chattering.
The evil horroroso will use the life force of the townspeople
translation.es: Los malvados horrorosos usarán la vitalidad de los habitantes.

translation.en: to create a dimensional gateway so their master can break through.
translation.es: para crear un portal dimensional, por el que su amo cruzará.

translation.en: It will leave them lifeless shells.
translation.es: Los dejarán como caparazones sin vida.

translation.en: We have to do something. And again, how do you know all this?
translation.es: Tenemos que hacer algo. Y repito, ¿cómo sabe todo eso?

translation.en: Later, Leo. Now, come.
Uh, hmm, "Girl's Guide to Chaos"...
translation.es: Guía de niñas para el caos...

translation.en: Oh! Here. I have it.
That looks like my abuela's tamale recipe.
translation.es: Eso parece la receta de tamales de mi abuela.

translation.en: But with more gunpowder.
It is a recipe.
With it, I can create a magical explosion that seals the gateway
translation.es: Con ella, puedo crear una explosión mágica que selle el portal

translation.en: and keeps Quetzalcoatl from our plane of existence.
translation.es: y le impida a Quetzalcóatl entrar al plano en que vivimos.

translation.en: But... we'd never get past the horroroso.
translation.es: Pero... no podremos evadir a los horrorosos.

translation.en: Friar, you make the tamale, then wait for us on the top of the tower.
translation.es: Fray, usted haga el tamal, y espérenos con él en la cima de la torre.

translation.en: Are you sure you want this?
What I want is to go home, have a hot bath,
translation.es: Lo que quiero es ir a mi casa, darme un buen baño,

translation.en: sleep, and wake up to Grandma's hot biscuits.
translation.es: dormir y despertar con las galletas calientes de la abuela.

translation.en: But we have to do this first.
It's bigger on the outside.
This craft, where did you get it?
Drop this into the center of the disturbance.
translation.es: Arroja esto en el centro del alboroto.

translation.en: Faster, Don Andres!
By all that is black and evil.
translation.es: Por mis canas, eso es maldad pura.

translation.en: [Leo] A little closer.
Closer, and... now!
Oh, man. Those creepers caught it.
-Turn us around. -What? Why?
[Leo] Do it!
What are you doing?
That's the only mystic bomb we have.
translation.es: ¡Es la única bomba mística que tenemos!

translation.en: I'm getting it back.
He can't throw it that far.
Use your leg ball!
Yay! Goal! Ha, ha!
Leo!
Oh, no.
[Don Andres] He was such a brave...
and stupid boy.
Now I'll never get to tell him how stupid he was.
translation.es: Ahora jamás podré decirle todo lo bruto que era.

translation.en: Sure you can. There he is.
[Alebrije] Hey, Leo! Up here! Hey, Leo!
-Yahtzee! -Go, Leo!
It was you.
You gave me this and it protected me.
translation.es: Tú me diste esto y me protegió.

translation.en: -Are you really an hechicera-in-training? -Of course not.
translation.es: ¿De verdad eres una aprendiz de hechicera? Claro que no, tontito.

translation.en: -But the necklace has power. [Peter] Hey, freak.
translation.es: - Pero el collar tiene poderes. - Oye, bicho raro.

translation.en: Thanks for saving us.
You're okay.
Yeah. You may be a weirdo, but you're our weirdo.
translation.es: Sí, puede que seas raro, pero eres nuestro raro.

translation.en: Marcella, I think my life has finally turned around.
translation.es: Marcella, creo que mi vida al fin está mejorando.

translation.en: Everything is coming up Leo!
translation.es: Todo se está dando para Leo.

translation.en: -Don't you think? -I do.
Okay, that was, um...
less enthusiastic than I thought.
Run!
Godofredo! Godofredo!
What?
Quickly, inside.
What's happening?
-I thought we stopped Quetzalcoatl. -Head to the bell tower.
translation.es: Creí que habíamos detenido a Quetzalcóatl. Los dos, vayan al campanario.

translation.en: Back, I say!
No further, fiend!
[Marcella] There's nowhere to run.
Marcella! No!
-Turn us around! [Teodora] Are you nuts?
[Don Andres] Alebrije, hold him!
Abuela, Friar Godofredo... Marcella.
They're all... gone.
My boy, what do you want to do?
I don't know exactly.
Except for one thing.
We stick together.
My life until now, my ghost vision, meeting you guys...
translation.es: Mi vida hasta ahora, mi visión fantasmal, conocerlos a ustedes...

translation.en: -I think we're meant to be together. -Count me in.
translation.es: - Estamos destinados a estar juntos. - Cuenta conmigo.

translation.en: I don't have anything else to do.
translation.es: No tengo otra cosa que hacer.

translation.en: We're safe up here for now so we can figure things out.
translation.es: Aquí estamos seguros por ahora para calmarnos y pensar bien qué hacer.

translation.en: We'll make sure our next move is carefully planned and perfectly executed.
translation.es: Nos aseguraremos de que nuestro próximo paso esté bien planeado y sea ejecutado a la perfección.
